typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Unit Nbr} as string,
		{Facility Id} as string,
		dist_carry as integer,
		dist_start as short,
		{Twin Fetch} as boolean,
		{Twin Carry} as boolean,
		{Twin Put} as boolean,
		{Category Id} as string,
		{Freight Kind Id} as string,
		to_pos_gkey as integer,
		fm_pos_gkey as integer,
		{Complex Id} as string,
		{Yard Id} as string,
		{Carrier Visit Key} as string,
		{Event Type Id} as string,
		{Move Kind} as string,
		{From Location} as string,
		{To Location} as string,
		{From Position Name} as string,
		{To Position Name} as string,
		{Carry CHE Operator Id} as string,
		{Fetch CHE Operator Id} as string,
		{Put CHE Operator Id} as string,
		{Fetch CHE Id} as string,
		{Fetch CHE Kind} as string,
		{Carry CHE Id} as string,
		{Carry CHE Kind} as string,
		{Put CHE Id} as string,
		{Put CHE Kind} as string,
		{QC CHE Id} as string,
		{QC CHE Kind} as string,
		t_carry_complete as string,
		t_put as string,
		t_fetch as string,
		t_dispatch as string,
		t_discharge as string,
		t_carry_dispatch as string,
		t_carry_fetch_ready as string,
		t_carry_put_ready as string,
		{Restow Reason} as string,
		{Container Line Id} as string,
		{Container Line Role} as string,
		pow as string,
		mve_gkey as integer,
		ufv_gkey as integer,
		{Berth Id} as string,
		{Goods And Ctr Wt Kg} as double,
		active_ufv as integer,
		{Requires Power Flag} as boolean,
		{OOG Flag} as boolean,
		{Shipper Id} as string,
		{Consignee Id} as string,
		{Commodity Id} as string,
		ATA as string,
		ATD as string,
		Rehandles as short
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: ['bronze/moves/load','bronze/moves/archive'],
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'cmsa',
	folderPath: 'bronze/movehistory/load',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	dateFormats: ['dd-MM-yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'','yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'']) ~> MoveHistory
Aggregate1 derive(t_carry_complete = coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_carry_complete,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_carry_complete,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')),
		t_put = coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')),
		t_fetch = coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_fetch,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_fetch,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')),
		t_discharge = coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_discharge,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_discharge,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')),
		Year = year(coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'))),
		Month = month(coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'))),
		Week = weekOfYear(coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'))),
		t_dispatch = coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_dispatch,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_dispatch,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')),
		t_carry_dispatch = coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_carry_dispatch,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_carry_dispatch,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')),
		t_carry_fetch_ready = coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_carry_fetch_ready,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_carry_fetch_ready,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')),
		t_carry_put_ready = coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_carry_put_ready,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_carry_put_ready,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')),
		Date = toDate(coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'))),
		Year_Week = (year(coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'))) * 100) + weekOfYear(coalesce(toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(t_put,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')))) ~> DataTypeConversion
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(mve_gkey),
	each(match(name!='mve_gkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
MoveHistory select(mapColumn(
		{Unit Nbr},
		{Complex Id},
		{Yard Id},
		{Carrier Visit Key},
		{Event Type Id},
		{Move Kind},
		{Carry CHE Operator Id},
		{Fetch CHE Operator Id},
		{Put CHE Operator Id},
		{Fetch CHE Id},
		{Fetch CHE Kind},
		{Carry CHE Id},
		{Carry CHE Kind},
		{Put CHE Id},
		{Put CHE Kind},
		{QC CHE Id},
		{QC CHE Kind},
		t_carry_complete,
		t_put,
		t_fetch,
		t_dispatch,
		t_discharge,
		t_carry_dispatch,
		t_carry_fetch_ready,
		t_carry_put_ready,
		dist_carry,
		dist_start,
		{Category Id},
		{Freight Kind Id},
		pow,
		mve_gkey,
		active_ufv,
		Rehandles
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
filter1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,' ','_') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
DataTypeConversion filter(!isNull(mve_gkey) && !isNull(t_put) && !isNull({Unit Nbr})) ~> filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		mve_gkey as integer,
		Unit_Nbr as string,
		Complex_Id as string,
		Yard_Id as string,
		Carrier_Visit_Key as string,
		Event_Type_Id as string,
		Move_Kind as string,
		Carry_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Fetch_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Put_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Fetch_CHE_Id as string,
		Fetch_CHE_Kind as string,
		Carry_CHE_Id as string,
		Carry_CHE_Kind as string,
		Put_CHE_Id as string,
		Put_CHE_Kind as string,
		QC_CHE_Id as string,
		QC_CHE_Kind as string,
		t_carry_complete as timestamp,
		t_put as timestamp,
		t_fetch as timestamp,
		t_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_discharge as timestamp,
		t_carry_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_carry_fetch_ready as timestamp,
		t_carry_put_ready as timestamp,
		dist_carry as integer,
		dist_start as short,
		Category_Id as string,
		Freight_Kind_Id as string,
		pow as string,
		active_ufv as integer,
		Rehandles as short,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer,
		Date as date,
		Year_Week as integer
	),
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'cmsa',
	folderPath: 'gold/rehandle',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['mve_gkey'],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		mve_gkey,
		Unit_Nbr,
		Complex_Id,
		Yard_Id,
		Carrier_Visit_Key,
		Event_Type_Id,
		Move_Kind,
		Carry_CHE_Operator_Id,
		Fetch_CHE_Operator_Id,
		Put_CHE_Operator_Id,
		Fetch_CHE_Id,
		Fetch_CHE_Kind,
		Carry_CHE_Id,
		Carry_CHE_Kind,
		Put_CHE_Id,
		Put_CHE_Kind,
		QC_CHE_Id,
		QC_CHE_Kind,
		t_carry_complete,
		t_put,
		t_fetch,
		t_dispatch,
		t_discharge,
		t_carry_dispatch,
		t_carry_fetch_ready,
		t_carry_put_ready,
		dist_carry,
		dist_start,
		Category_Id,
		Freight_Kind_Id,
		pow,
		active_ufv,
		Rehandles,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week,
		Date,
		Year_Week
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1
